General.Name: Sarawak Cable Bhd
General.Description: Sarawak Cable Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells power cables, wires, and conductors in Malaysia and internationally. It offers low voltage (LV), medium voltage (MV), and high voltage (HV) power cables; fire resistant/flame retardant cables; LV and MV aerial twisted/bundled cables; oil and gas specialized cables; instrumentation and control cables; housing wires; telecommunication cables; optical ground wires; HV bare conductors; and underground cables. The company also provides steel towers, low and high-tension steel poles, telecommunication towers and poles, building steel structures, galvanized products, street lighting columns, and guardrails; and hot-dip galvanizing services, as well as tower testing facilities. In addition, it is involved in the design, supply, delivery, erection, and commissioning of transmission lines; provision of civil works for substation and power plant projects; and general infrastructure and construction works. Further, the company operates an 11MW mini-hydro electric power plant located in North Sumatera, Indonesia; and offers management and consulting services. Additionally, it provides surveillance, inspection, and maintenance services for power lines through helicopters; emergency medical services; and ad hoc aviation services. Sarawak Cable Berhad was incorporated in 1998 and is based in Kuching, Malaysia.
